tasks.label: Auto Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "test" -w prs-rs/src

tasks.label: Auto Test on Save (with Integration Tests)
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "test" -w prs-rs/src -w prs-rs/tests

tasks.label: Auto Coverage on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo watch -x "tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build --workspace --exclude prs-rs-cli" -w prs-rs/src

tasks.label: Test Cross-Compile: Linux (PowerPC 32-bit) [Big Endian]
tasks.command: cargo install cross --git https://github.com/cross-rs/cross --quiet && cross test --target powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu

tasks.label: Test Cross-Compile: Linux (PowerPC 64-bit) [Big Endian]
tasks.command: cargo install cross --git https://github.com/cross-rs/cross --quiet && cross test --target powerpc64-unknown-linux-gnu
